CustomField.formula: If(ParentId != null, CASE(TEXT( Parent.RTL_Category__c ), "Communication",$Label.RTL_Communication_Label, "Information Update", $Label.RTL_Information_Update_Label, "Invitation",$Label.RTL_Invitation_Label, "Sales",$Label.RTL_Sales_Label ,TEXT( Parent.RTL_Category__c )) , CASE(TEXT(RTL_Category__c), "Communication",$Label.RTL_Communication_Label, "Information Update", $Label.RTL_Information_Update_Label, "Invitation",$Label.RTL_Invitation_Label, "Sales",$Label.RTL_Sales_Label ,TEXT(RTL_Category__c)) )
CustomField.label: Campaign Category
